website_summaries.verdict: Low price for a versatile sports pad that offers extra handles, so you can hold it differently for each drill.
pros: Pad that offers 5 different support handles so you can hold it in the most comfortable way to complete the current drill
Works well for all kinds of sports, including football
Foam pad will hold shape, even with repeated use
Composite leather cover will resist tears, even during tough practice sessions
cons: A little smaller pad than some others at 16 inches by 24 inches

customer_reviews.title: A very good practice pad
customer_reviews.text: This pad is a pretty good buy. It is large enough for kids (and adults) to hit without worrying about missing and easy to hold. 3 handles on the back and 1 on each side make it versatile for a multitude of kicks and punches. It is very sturdy and solid and gives excellent cushioning for the person holding it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great Pad for Basketball drills
customer_reviews.text: The GoSports Blocking Pad 24" x 16" is a great pad for my basketball team. I use it to teach the boys how to get around a screen or a defender. It padded well so the kids can hit it pretty well and not feel a thing. The handles for my hands are well placed. I can position the pad for maximum protection. The material, while not leather, is pretty good. The size is just right. Perhaps a little large for basketball, but it does its job well. I highly recommend to any coaches or assistant coaches. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J Balanay

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for Krav Maga!
customer_reviews.text: My husband started practicing Krav Maga about two months ago and this is perfect for practicing at home. It even gets me and the kids involved, which is fun! It’s sturdy and the handles have some padding as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great for football. Durable and takes a beating.
customer_reviews.text: Durable and works great for my three sons when we work on offensive blocking and defensive ripping and swimming techniques. It is a little on the smaller side which is its only downside. But it was obviously made to accommodate multiple different uses/sports, so that’s understandable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Great for my daughters kicking practice
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about. I’m using for my 11 year olds taekwondo practice. It is a kind of firm. Not super firm like some of the Muay Thai stuff is. About 5 or 6 inches thick. The ones at her dojo are super thick and softer but this one works just fine for us and was half the price of the one that is 11 inches thick.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Works well to protect autistic child from self-injurious behaviors
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to prevent one of my autistic students from hitting his head on hard surfaces and the floor when upset or ill. They work wonderfully and help us to keep him safe without putting ourselves in harms way.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Taekwondo Bag
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to help with practicing taekwondo between classes. It absorbes kicks and punches really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jake M

customer_reviews.title: Great pads
customer_reviews.text: Great value, my 8 year old football beast of a son hits these pad super hard & they hold up great. Easy to hold great price. I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Ruben R

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but durable and just what you're looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I chose to buy this used but when I received it, it was brand new. The boxes were a bit beat up but I purchased 2 and just saved $20. Excited to use this for youth football. The handles are quality and the pad is excellent for the price. Would have preferred a softer but tight fit to the material. If you're looking at one of these, buy it. A great price and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Great durability
customer_reviews.text: Its lightweight but does its job perfect. My 10yo have a hard kicks and punches, he uses this twice a week and so far it still look and feel brand new. Great durability!
customer_reviews.author: dianadoo

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service, Great product
customer_reviews.text: See original review below. I contacted customer service through the GoSports website and they responded promptly. After sending them proof of damage, they agreed to send me a replacement. In the meantime, I have used the pad. As long as the seams don't bust, it feels like an awesome pad for practicing kicks. The bottom seam of the pad I received arrived busted. I'm a little worried about how it will continue to rip if I use it. Otherwise, it seemed solid. I would have liked the rear loops to be slightly larger to more easily fit my arm through. But otherwise, if it came defect-free, it would have been a good pad.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: It's a good investment
customer_reviews.text: It worth every $. It absorbs kicks very well. It has a bit of smell that comes out of it when it breaths from kicks. Putting that aside, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Atikutzu

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: They are holding up perfectly. I use this for football and martial arts. Good material and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, perfect size, great price
customer_reviews.text: My kid does Taekwondo, and this is perfect for her when practicing The price is lower then most, and the quality is great, even when the kids decide to jump all over it, it hasnt shown any signs of tear and wear
customer_reviews.author: Asdrubal Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Takes the brunt instead of us
customer_reviews.text: We got this because my son needed to practice at home. He usually would push off us but this blocker is perfect for that. Can use the techniques he learns at practice to continue them at home. Holds up really well and can hold it in a couple different ways which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Beth K.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't absorb kick power as well as those in our gym
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Doesn't absorb kick power as well as the kick pads in the gym. The kicker needs to kick with less power. Even with less kick power, the holder should brace and meet the kick. The holder can feel the kick impact and can be thrown off balance.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter pad
customer_reviews.text: I am teaching my son karate and self defense. This is a perfect tool in giving him a target and a way for me to whack him without hurting him. For the price, I was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blocking pad. Kids enjoy it, but had to wrap it up with tape due to cancer notice (which is on all of these pads I’ve come across). May also get them hand gloves in future to avoid touching it physically. Otherwise, pad is sturdy and looks durable. Has great portability and handles are secure. It’s doing a good job so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Durable and light
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold and very durable. It's stiffer than other blocking pads but it's well made and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jumpstop

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I do Basketball training and All my kids can't wait for this thing to come out. I push on them while they are driving in for layups and they love it. So far after several months it's still like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not firm/thick enough. Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Chose this one because it was a best seller on Amazon! I like the handles but feel they are a tad tight, seems to be well made. My complaint is that it is very soft, not firm enough to absorb the kicks. Is very lightweight, I'm surprised it's a best seller on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs87

customer_reviews.title: Great punching/kicking pad
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kids to practice their karate moves. Large, sturdy and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Quirp

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to manage. Iv been using this with my basketball players. Easy to hold with the different handles. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating.
customer_reviews.text: Got this because my seven year old twin boys started playing tackle football. Not only is it great for football skill drills but is perfect for ruff housing with kicks and punches. Very durable and should last for years. The boys love it!
customer_reviews.author: FireRobTop Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: Great for basketball contact training
customer_reviews.text: I am coaching my son’s youth basketball team and I use it to teach them how to finish shots with contact. I also let them punch it every now and again to get some of their energy out. Great product; if it holds up to 10 year olds, it will hold up to anything.
customer_reviews.author: George Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Great for Taekwondo
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and the handles are not flimsy. Use this for Taekwondo training with my daughter and we both love it for home practice.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - Quality Pads
customer_reviews.text: Bought for youth football team. Based on previous reviews, thought it might be small - it was not; the perfect/standard size. Good quality and strong handles. Works great for football.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Pfaffe

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very much adult size pad. We use it to practice making layups in basketball with contact. Very easy to hold and thus far holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Solid product for the price. I see a lot of complaints about it being too hard and I’m not sure why. I’ve used curved shields from quite a few manufacturers and this doesn’t seem like it’s any more dense than the others. Maybe people are striking with their instep or something. The only thing I’d change is adding a strap on the other short side.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: You will love this pad, don't hesitate to purchase!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong with this pad, we were looking for a football / MMA pad and this one is definitely it!
customer_reviews.author: eric mcquistion

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great service!!
customer_reviews.text: What I really loved was how fast I received this item. I literally received the item in one day. That never happens with me because I live in a rural area. The blocking pad is durable and great quality thank you so much! Yall are the best
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get any better than this pad
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t get any better than this pad. Safe and productive . Everyone loves the blocking pad! Great for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Blocking Pad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help teach my son how to be more physical when receiving a ball in soccer so he could learn to get separation from defenders. It works very well and I have been able to help him be more physical without hurting him or myself. Would recommend this pad. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great football pad to use at home for football training. Exactly as described. Easy to use. Durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Piece
customer_reviews.text: Excellent beginner’s striking pad. While there are thicker, more sturdy versions on the market, this one does the job in most training sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Good product but...
customer_reviews.text: Good thickness but you missed to inform on the product description Prop 65 Warning, which was displayed on the attached tag.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina P.

customer_reviews.title: Good shield for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good kick shield for the value. I use it for training my 5 year old son on his karate kicks.
customer_reviews.author: SuperKenchan

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This item is ok. Could be a lot better but for the price not a bad choice
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn M. Davy

customer_reviews.title: Ok if that's what your looking for OK work🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this it's made out of good quality it's just the straps and how you hold it at their bags seemed to be placed better and have better grip handles
customer_reviews.author: jason ackermann

customer_reviews.title: Kid likes it
customer_reviews.text: Is tough and a good size. We use it four football practice at home. Holds up well. Isn't too heavy, but weighs enough to hold onto well.
customer_reviews.author: Tessie Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke right away from being punched by 2 little kids!
customer_reviews.author: Hobby reader

customer_reviews.title: Good pad!
customer_reviews.text: So far, very good! Not to be used heavy duty, only with my little 4-yr old home practice.
customer_reviews.author: JADS

customer_reviews.title: The pad is great .
customer_reviews.text: I use this to work on contact drills with my athletes. Well put together.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr. old loves to do her karate kicks and punches on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle-Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for training
customer_reviews.text: This pad is just what I was looking for for my basketball trainings. Now we can work on and1’s drawing contact and still being able to finish at the rim. The kids love it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Randall

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Received today, daughter loves it Excellent for her to practice her punches and kicks. Good quality, easy to hold. Will purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Erika D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I coach basketball and use this pad every practice, this pad is great to use.!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bishoff

customer_reviews.title: Good price, high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Use it for strong finishing in basketball, high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Spandikow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for running drills with my 130lb son. He is center and nose guard he has put a hurting on this bag and the bag has been taking it like a seasoned pro!
customer_reviews.author: Killeenc

customer_reviews.title: Durable  & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This pad is easy to use, durable & works well with training kids to play basketball with contact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good for the price and seems like it will hold up over time. Used for football drills. Shipping was quick. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: is a little harder than some
customer_reviews.text: great product .use it for my 7 and 8 yr olds for football
customer_reviews.author: TBone

customer_reviews.title: Great for karate practice!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to help our son practice karate at home. They are easy to hold and thick enough we don't feel the kicks. Great addition to our training equipment!
customer_reviews.author: SDS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very durable with plenty of cushion! We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for training athletes
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect to train my son and his teammates. I like the straps that help me keep it in control and allows me to target where they receive contact.
customer_reviews.author: Neil A. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great to have to train with contact
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny I use this equipment everyday for training so far very good easy to use and does not hurt when giving contact
customer_reviews.author: Deondrae Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great for basketball to shoot/dribble while getting hit
customer_reviews.text: Using for our club basketball team, and it's already paying dividends in our first tournament.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Samuelson

customer_reviews.title: Great item to get your kids started ... not professional grade
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered ... Inexpensive way to get your kids started ... not professional grade ... bought it to train kids ...
customer_reviews.author: J.R. Flip

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price!
customer_reviews.text: Family practices Krav Maga. Use weekly. Very happy with value and price. A++
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Crimm

customer_reviews.title: LOVING THIS BLOCKING PAD
customer_reviews.text: Really like the multiple handles to where you can grab the pad. Currently using it for basketball practice. Loving It and the price is affordable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl McNair

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and my son really enjoys using it. We are using it in a strength training capacity. The grips are also very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Freedgood

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot
customer_reviews.text: Very close to 5 star. Can be better for holding.
customer_reviews.author: abuiris

customer_reviews.title: Practice Pad
customer_reviews.text: Great pad for numerous sports. It’s durable and easy to hold. It’s very good for football players.
customer_reviews.author: Tavia Foster

customer_reviews.title: Krav maga
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to practice Krav Maga. It works perfectly other than the lack of handles
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ozuna

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price, just not large enough.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong size. I needed a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Selleck

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: It's a good pad not the best but good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Evie Firm

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag, can definitely be used for karate - kicking and punching. Great bag for the price. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: BSH

product_meta.title: GoSports Blocking Pad 24" x 16" Great for Martial Arts & Sports Training (Football, Basketball, Hockey, Lacrosse and More), Black (GS-BP-01)
product_meta.description: Step up your training with the Go Sports blocking pad. This versatile training tool can be used for either simulated sports contact drills for boxing/MMA training. For sports, this provides a safer alternative to contact drills while still giving players realistic experience. The blocking pad can also be used for a wide variety of boxing/MMA training drills. The blocking pad is built to last and backed by a full money back guarantee. Go Sports is a US company with US customer service.
feature_bullets: Contact drills: Heavy duty blocking pad for safely simulating contact drills for a variety of sports or for martial arts training
5 reinforced handles: Strategically placed handles to provide superior control over the traditional 2 handle blocking pads use for football, basketball, mixed martial arts, and more
Athlete fundamentals: Perfect training aid for athletes of various skill levels – youth, middle school, high school, and college athletes
Absorbs impact: Blocking pad measures 24”l x 16”w x 5”h with 5” thick core of high density foam to minimize impact and features a tear proof composite leather surface
